channel.title: Am I too ready for college?
channel.description: I have already packed all of my boxes and shit for college, the only stuff left is my computer, clothes, and stuff to get me through my last year of high school. I already know which college I am going to, where I am going to live, and a bunch of other shit that most other people don't know until the last minute. I tried to convince my parents to let me move to where I am going to be going to college (my hometown) and go to a private high school (all of my old friends are there, and alot of hot girls), but that failed epicly. Mind you I am starting my senior year in 20 days....am I too ready?

item.title: Am I too ready for college?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:44, topic:352816”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=449132.msg3310429#msg3310429 date=1281933398]
Just got moved in yesterday…senior year starts Wednesday…pretty happy atm…this is the living room I put my desk behind the couch and my comp is hooked up to the tv so this is 20x better than were I was living.


[/quote]
That is incredible. How much do you pay in rent? I’ve seen the on-campus accommodation at my university, and it is absolutely nothing by comparison to your place. Seriously, what the fuck – a fireplace?![/quote]

It’s my grandparent’s basement (that room you see, a kitchen behind it, bedroom to the right were the windows are, and exercise room off of that. I just have to mow the lawn, vacuum, and do any other shit they ask and I can stay, I have to move out after college though buts thats 5 years from now so…I’m kinda in fear of posting other pictures and being accused of being rich. I’ve really never had anything like this in my life and my old room was a twin bed that was kinda small so im pretty excited. I might post some more in a bit.

Read full topic
item.source: Am I too ready for college?

item.title: Am I too ready for college?
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

well lothy, hes not in college yet, so im assuming hes with his grandparents…

mwiebelhaus:

Hmm I guess your right. All I know is this is what is happening after school ends: Drive to my grandparents house where I will be living (trust me its 10000x better than it sounds and 10000x better than a dorm)

Read full topic

@lothy wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:40, topic:352816”]Just got moved in yesterday…senior year starts Wednesday…pretty happy atm…this is the living room I put my desk behind the couch and my comp is hooked up to the tv so this is 20x better than were I was living.

[/quote]
That is incredible. How much do you pay in rent? I’ve seen the on-campus accommodation at my university, and it is absolutely nothing by comparison to your place. Seriously, what the fuck – a fireplace?!

On a sidenote im going out tonight with two girls. Life is pretty good, but I know Im going to get a raping when I get into AP Calc I, so I should enjoy this while I can.

item.title: Am I too ready for college?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:37, topic:352816”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=449132.msg3301942#msg3301942 date=1281373343]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=449132.msg3301769#msg3301769 date=1281361172]

[quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=449132.msg3301752#msg3301752 date=1281359731]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=449132.msg3301750#msg3301750 date=1281359283]

[quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=449132.msg3301423#msg3301423 date=1281326720]

[quote author=Newty link=topic=449132.msg3301318#msg3301318 date=1281320096]

[quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=449132.msg3300884#msg3300884 date=1281295930]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=449132.msg3299966#msg3299966 date=1281224000]

[quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=449132.msg3299930#msg3299930 date=1281221431]

Its a good thing to be excited man.

It’s the best years of your life, I’m sure anyone here who has ever been can vouch for that.

Good luck…and congratulations
[/quote]College sucks and was a waste of my time. Worst educational period in my life.

What happened for you?
[/quote]Nothing, just that i didn’t learn anything at all (except some math)

Ahh I see, what did you take up?

now you can booze on fridayz homie@!

Well I don’t know about that but I am pretty much free to do whatever I feel. The only rule is no females in the bedroom but there are plenty of other places to go…
[/quote]That’s the only rule at my house too. Sad thing is i still don’t have enough respect to follow it and since my room is in the basement im constantly sneaking my (now ex) girlfriend and other girls in the basement window.

Its a good thing to be excited man.

It’s the best years of your life, I’m sure anyone here who has ever been can vouch for that.

Good luck…and congratulations
[/quote]College sucks and was a waste of my time. Worst educational period in my life.

What happened for you?
[/quote]Nothing, just that i didn’t learn anything at all (except some math)
[/quote]What area of study?

Well its probably going to be the same for me haha. The whole basement is mine and it was finished off about 2 years ago with game room, exercise room, living room, kitchen, and a couple of bedrooms so I don’t know how they will be able to keep track of me easily when they are on the upper level the whole time.

I’m also living in that same setup, pretty badass isn’t it?

Hell yes, I mean i’m not there atm but I visit over the summer and christmas, I will be there in 5 days as long as they can get my transferred over in time and can get me a schedule to meet the requirements for the senior year. But once i’m there I will be free as fuck, I won’t know what to do with myself. I will have to meet some of my old friends from along time ago then from there hmmmm…
[/quote]GET SOME WOMEN!

I already have some ladies friends there, but I wouldn’t want to post pics for the sake that they somehow how could make the connection to here, which would be disastrous as nobody knows that I browse this site (except you guys). Besides the fact that it is probably an invasion of privacy to post pics from private Facebook profiles. But yes I do hope to get some women, as the women in the city I am currently living in are all unfuckably ugly to the point that, if your not careful, your dick may shrink from overexposure.
[/quote]Been there done that. Moved from Ottawa to this little city outside of Toronto where all the girls were soooo damned ugly. It sucked because I dumped my (in my opinion) gorgeous girlfriend when I had to move. The next year I moved back to Ottawa and hooked up with my ex’s 18 year old sister. Ottawa is a gold-mine of babes.

Hell yes, big citys are awesome. Its like all the hot girls flock there, plenty to pick from.
[/quote]Go to a club.[/quote]
Probably going to be going to alot of places. I already talked to some girls so we are going to hang the first day I get there, also just talked to my new hs counselor and everything is almost finalized.

Read full topic

But yes I do hope to get some women, as the women in the city I am currently living in are all unfuckably ugly to the point that, if your not careful, your dick may shrink from overexposure.

Its a good thing to be excited man.

It’s the best years of your life, I’m sure anyone here who has ever been can vouch for that.

Good luck…and congratulations
[/quote]College sucks and was a waste of my time. Worst educational period in my life.

What happened for you?
[/quote]Nothing, just that i didn’t learn anything at all (except some math)
[/quote]What area of study?

Well its probably going to be the same for me haha. The whole basement is mine and it was finished off about 2 years ago with game room, exercise room, living room, kitchen, and a couple of bedrooms so I don’t know how they will be able to keep track of me easily when they are on the upper level the whole time.

I’m also living in that same setup, pretty badass isn’t it?

Hell yes, I mean i’m not there atm but I visit over the summer and christmas, I will be there in 5 days as long as they can get my transferred over in time and can get me a schedule to meet the requirements for the senior year. But once i’m there I will be free as fuck, I won’t know what to do with myself. I will have to meet some of my old friends from along time ago then from there hmmmm…[/quote]GET SOME WOMEN!

Read full topic
item.source: Am I too ready for college?

item.title: Am I too ready for college?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:30, topic:352816”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=449132.msg3300884#msg3300884 date=1281295930]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=449132.msg3299966#msg3299966 date=1281224000]

[quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=449132.msg3299930#msg3299930 date=1281221431]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=449132.msg3299926#msg3299926 date=1281221312]

Its a good thing to be excited man.

It’s the best years of your life, I’m sure anyone here who has ever been can vouch for that.

Good luck…and congratulations
[/quote]College sucks and was a waste of my time. Worst educational period in my life.

What happened for you?
[/quote]Nothing, just that i didn’t learn anything at all (except some math)

Ahh I see, what did you take up?

now you can booze on fridayz homie@!

Well I don’t know about that but I am pretty much free to do whatever I feel. The only rule is no females in the bedroom but there are plenty of other places to go…
[/quote]That’s the only rule at my house too. Sad thing is i still don’t have enough respect to follow it and since my room is in the basement im constantly sneaking my (now ex) girlfriend and other girls in the basement window.

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=449132.msg3299926#msg3299926 date=1281221312]

Its a good thing to be excited man.

It’s the best years of your life, I’m sure anyone here who has ever been can vouch for that.

Good luck…and congratulations
[/quote]College sucks and was a waste of my time. Worst educational period in my life.

What happened for you?
[/quote]Nothing, just that i didn’t learn anything at all (except some math)
[/quote]What area of study?

Well its probably going to be the same for me haha. The whole basement is mine and it was finished off about 2 years ago with game room, exercise room, living room, kitchen, and a couple of bedrooms so I don’t know how they will be able to keep track of me easily when they are on the upper level the whole time.

I’m also living in that same setup, pretty badass isn’t it? :D[/quote]

Hell yes, I mean i’m not there atm but I visit over the summer and christmas, I will be there in 5 days as long as they can get my transferred over in time and can get me a schedule to meet the requirements for the senior year. But once i’m there I will be free as fuck, I won’t know what to do with myself. I will have to meet some of my old friends from along time ago then from there hmmmm…
